compliance_assessment.framework_description: ISO/IEC 27001 is an international standard for information security management systems (ISMS), providing a systematic approach to managing sensitive company information, ensuring its confidentiality, integrity, and availability.

requirements.evidence: Access controls are planned but not fully implemented.
gaps: No role-based access control implemented yet.
recommendations: Implement role-based access control to restrict access based on user roles.

requirements.evidence: Data in transit is not encrypted.
gaps: Lack of HTTPS implementation for data transmission.
recommendations: Implement HTTPS to encrypt data in transit.

requirements.evidence: Security audits are planned but not yet conducted.
recommendations: Conduct regular security audits to identify vulnerabilities.

critical_gaps: Lack of encryption for data in transit.
remediation_plan: Implement HTTPS for all data transmissions.
Schedule and conduct regular security audits.
